mapper.select: SELECT MMSA.PLNT_CD , MMSA.AITM_SPEC_IDX , MMSA.AITM_SEQ , MMSA.ISP_DUR_TM , MMSA.EQM_USE_TM , MMSA.AMITM_CD , (SELECT VRIA_KN FROM MS_AMITM MA WHERE MA.AMITM_CD = MMSA.AMITM_CD) AS VRIA_KN , (SELECT VRIA_NO FROM MS_AMITM MA WHERE MA.AMITM_CD = MMSA.AMITM_CD) AS VRIA_NO , (SELECT AITM_KN FROM MS_AITM WHERE AITM_CD = (SELECT AITM_CD FROM MS_AMITM MA WHERE MA.AMITM_CD = MMSA.AMITM_CD)) AS AITM_KN , MMSA.PERSPEC_TXT , MMSA.OWC_SPEC_TXT , MMSA.SPEC_TXT_EN , MMSA.PER_SLV_LOW , MMSA.PER_SLV_UPP , MMSA.PER_SLV_DESC , MMSA.OWC_SLV_LOW , MMSA.OWC_SLV_UPP , MMSA.OWC_SLV_DESC , MMSA.RST_DPNT , MMSA.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , MMSA.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , DECODE(MMSA.RPT_PRT_YN, 'Y', '출력함', '출력안함') AS RPT_PRT_YN , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMSA.SPEC_TYP) AS SPEC_TYP_NM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMSA.JDG_TYP) AS JDG_TYP_NM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMSA.SLV_JDG_CFM AND SCD.PLNT_CD = MMSA.PLNT_CD) AS SLV_JDG_CFM_NM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMSA.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM AND SCD.PLNT_CD = MMSA.PLNT_CD) AS SLV_JDG_NON_CFM_NM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = MMSA.RST_UNIT_CD AND SCD.PLNT_CD = MMSA.PLNT_CD) AS RST_UNIT_NM FROM MM_MITM_SPEC_AITM MMSA WHERE MMSA.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND AITM_SPEC_IDX = #{aitmSpecIdx} ORDER BY MMSA.AITM_ORD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MT_MITM_ANS_RST ( PLNT_CD , MITM_REQ_IDX , RST_SEQ , RST_PROC_CD , ANS_DPT_CD , AMITM_CD , AITM_ORD , PERSPEC_TXT , OWC_SPEC_TXT , SPEC_TXT_EN , SPEC_TYP , JDG_TYP , PER_SLV_LOW , PER_SLV_UPP , PER_SLV_DESC , OWC_SLV_LOW , OWC_SLV_UPP , OWC_SLV_DESC , SLV_JDG_CFM , SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , RST_UNIT_CD , RST_DPNT , RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , RPT_PRT_YN , ISP_DPT_CD , SMP_CLLT_QTY , SMP_CLLT_UNIT , ISP_DUR_TM , EQM_USE_TM ) SELECT #{plntCd} , #{mitmReqIdx} , AITM_SEQ , 'S0140100' , ANS_DPT_CD , AMITM_CD , AITM_ORD , PERSPEC_TXT , OWC_SPEC_TXT , SPEC_TXT_EN , SPEC_TYP , JDG_TYP , PER_SLV_LOW , PER_SLV_UPP , PER_SLV_DESC , OWC_SLV_LOW , OWC_SLV_UPP , OWC_SLV_DESC , SLV_JDG_CFM , SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , RST_UNIT_CD , RST_DPNT , RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , RPT_PRT_YN , ISP_DPT_CD , SMP_CLLT_QTY , SMP_CLLT_UNIT , ISP_DUR_TM , EQM_USE_TM FROM MM_MITM_SPEC_AITM WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND AITM_SPEC_IDX = #{aitmSpecIdx}
